text: main ( ) { int row , i , j , test ; int * * ar ; scanf ( "%d" , & test ) ; while ( test -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & row ) ; ar = ( int * * ) malloc ( sizeof ( * ar ) * row ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < row ; i ++ ) ar [ i ] = ( int * ) malloc ( sizeof ( * * ar ) * ( i + 1 ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < row ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & ar [ i ] [ j ] ) ; for ( i = row - 1 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) for ( j = i ; j > 0 ; j -- ) { if ( ar [ i ] [ j ] > ar [ i ] [ j - 1 ] ) ar [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] += ar [ i ] [ j ] ; else ar [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] += ar [ i ] [ j - 1 ] ; } printf ( "%d\n" , ar [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } }
